text: [Music]
once upon a time
in a land far away
there lived a beautiful princess
named cinderella
cinderella was married to the handsome
prince leo
they lived happily in the great castle
and enjoyed their lives but back at
cinderella's home her stepmother lady
puffy and her two daughters were all
upset and jealous
if i was living at that castle i would
be going to the best balls and dances
i would be eating the most delicious
meals at the castle every evening
even their cat papu would dream about a
wealthy life at the castle
lady puffy was so angry that she threw
cinderella's things out the attic window
one by one
[Music]
ah
we don't need any of these things
anymore it's all useless
suddenly lady puffy
spotted a box which was left in the
corner of the room
with great curiosity she opened it up
and found an old pocket watch inside
lady puffy took the pocket watch and
headed to the living room the sisters
also were very curious when they saw the
old watch and they pressed the button on
the side of the watch to open it up
and to see what was hiding inside
it seemed to be an ordinary watch with
an ordinary mirror
except the hands of the clock began to
turn backwards
all of a sudden
bright lights shone out of the watch and
lit up the whole room
they were all surprised and suddenly an
evil fairy appeared in front of them
finally i'm back in the real world
you
what
who are you
i am the fairy of the past my name is
kyra bell
kyra bell was thrown out of the fairy
world because she was a bad-hearted
cruel fairy
she told lady puffy and her daughters
whoever of you ladies saved me may make
a wish
anything you want
[Music]
me me
[Applause]
it was me
the evil fairy kyra bell chose lady
puffy for the wish and without
hesitation lady puffy made a wish
i want you to turn back time to the
night of the ball prince leo shall get
married to one of my beautiful daughters
the evil fairy waved her magic wand at
the pocket watch and made every watch in
the whole country
turn
backwards
[Music]
when that happened
cinderella suddenly found herself back
in time at the night in which she became
married to the prince
then
time slipped backwards again when she
was at the huge mansion that was built
for the glass slipper
she tried to get into the mansion again
then
she moved back in time again
when lady puffy and her daughters locked
her up in the house and went to the
mansion to try on the glass slipper
prince leo found cinderella's shoe at
the castle stairs and again the clock
hit twelve
the wonderful dance took place once more
then
cinderella headed to the castle in her
pumpkin coach
time kept slipping backwards
until
cinderella found herself
sitting under the hazelnut tree with
cheddar and mozzarella
and fairy leah bell came back again
beautiful cinderella i came to help you
lethal what's going on the prince
doesn't know me anymore
this must be the work of my evil sister
kyra bell
leah bell told about some mysterious box
in the world of the fairies
it was strictly forbidden to open up
that box but fairy kyrie bell opened it
anyway
she told that kyra bell was punished and
trapped into an old pocket watch after a
long time had passed she was set out of
her prison by lady puffy and her
daughters
she showed cinderella that kyra bell was
together with them
lady puffy made a horrible wish to kyra
bell
in order to fix this we need to lock her
back up inside of that watch
i agree but how
leah bell cinderella and their little
friends
made a plan
another few days turned backwards
the ambassador of the castle announced
the ball again
but this time cassandra and jezebel
didn't tell cinderella about the ball
and tried on their ballroom dresses in
secret
the next day to stop cinderella from
going to the ball lady puffy locked her
up in the attic
and walked away with her daughters
without saying anything
entering the ballroom kyra bell appeared
next to them she waved her magic wand
and put a love spell on cassandra
as soon as cassandra entered the
ballroom
she caught prince leo's attention thanks
to the love spell
the prince headed towards her and asked
her if she would dance with him
meanwhile cinderella and her little
friends were still locked up in the
attic waiting for the good fairy
the white pigeon arrived at cinderella's
small window carrying the old pocket
watch in which kyra bell was trapped
before
a moment later
the good fairy leah bell appeared in
front of them
we have to go to the hazelnut tree right
now
fairy waved her magic wand once
and
all of a sudden cinderella and her
friends found themselves under the
hazelnut tree again but from behind the
tree the evil fairy kyrie bell surprised
them
[Music]
your plan will fail cinderella will
never make it and now it's your time to
be trapped in the watch leah bell
the evil fairy cast her spells at leo
bell with all her nasty powers and leah
bell
bought back with her magic wand
[Music]
the little mice and pigeon hid behind
cinderella because of the powerful
battle
leah bell's wand became stronger and
stronger
and finally the evil fairy was defeated
and blown down to the ground cinderella
the watch open the watch hurry up no
please i can't be trapped inside that
watch again
cinderella opened the watch in her hand
quickly
[Music]
the evil fairy kyra bell disappeared
slowly and went back into the mirror in
the watch
[Music]
all the watches in the country started
to move correctly again but of course
this was not the end of the story the
ball i'm too late for the ball leah bell
the good fairy with a magic touch gave
cinderella a wonderful dress
and her famous glass shoes
a few moments later with a little help
of magic she turned the pigeon into a
huge bird
so
cinderella sat down on the back of the
pigeon and without wasting a moment they
quickly flew away to the castle
[Music]
but when she arrived she saw prince leo
dancing with cassandra
[Music]
mozzarella and cheddar ran to the prince
and tried to wake him from his spell hey
the most beautiful girl at the ball is
over there the most beautiful girl
whatever let us dance
look she's waiting for you go
as soon as prince leo saw cinderella he
fell in love with her again
and the magic of true love destroyed the
spell of the evil fairy
cinderella and prince leo started to
dance
i think i know you your beautiful face
looks really
familiar cinderella happily danced with
the prince
also mozzarella and cheddar were dancing
finally everything was as it was
supposed to be
cinderella and prince leo were married
again
within a few days
and their lovely hearts were back on
track
[Music]
while lady puffy and her arrogant
daughters were mad out of jealousy
we couldn't make it again again
[Music]
once upon a time
there was a very different and wonderful
life
in the deepest parts of the oceans
dolphins were swimming and singing
and huge whales were dancing with tiny
fish
the little mermaid arya on the other
hand sometimes was having fun with her
sisters living in the underwater kingdom
and sometimes spending time with prince
edward in the castle on land
how beautiful the sunset is isn't it my
prince the sky looks like it's falling
asleep when you fall asleep you are as
beautiful as this sunset arya
[Music]
there was also a witch named vega
in this beautiful peaceful and fun
underwater world
snake pull those muscles aside i'm
getting confused about which way to go
all right your majesties
gets out of our ways
where are these tracks
where
it's very difficult
to track things under the waters yes
but that old turtle must have left a
mark somewhere
vegas set out that day to find the
oldest turtle in the ocean
her goal was to learn the location of
the heart of the ocean
she thought that if she could capture
the heart of the ocean
she could rule not only the deep sea
kingdom
but the whole world
however
she was unaware that the beautiful ocean
life could end
if the heart of the ocean moved even a
little
while the villains continued to try and
track
the underwater king poseidon
went to visit the little mermaid arya
hey it's my father poseidon
father
arya my beautiful daughter
what is the reason for this surprise
visit daddy
my daughter
people keep polluting the seas
our fish friends collect garbage every
day
but still it does not help
on behalf of my people i apologize to
you very much my king
you have to teach the people not to
pollute the oceans i will take care of
this personally my dear king
just as king poseidon was going the
little mermaid said she wanted to come
and help them
[Music]
father i'll help my fish friends forge a
clean life in the ocean
while poseidon and arya were collecting
the garbage thrown into the sea
the sea witch vega and snake finally
found the place of the old turtle
[Music]
however
the turtle was sleeping so deeply that
they could not wake him up
wake up turtle
wake up
the old turtle continued to sleep deeply
even though vega was knocking loudly and
snake constantly disturbed him by
swimming around ah we finally found
sandy sleepings
i guess we won't be able to wake him up
so i'll give these delicious seaweeds to
someone else
just then
hearing the words delicious seaweed
the turtle suddenly opened his eyes huh
did someone say
seaweed that's my favorite we made so
much noise but you woke up to that
the secret of my long life is hidden in
my sleeping
but i would gladly give up some sleep
for delicious seaweed
did i mention that it's my favorite
uh yeah
just exactly how old are you
stopped counting after i was 150
years old of course i may have slept
through a decade or two
huh
you are older than i expected
oh
this is so good did i mention it's my
favorite
since you are this old i guess you can
answer the question i wanted to ask you
well that would depend on what the
question is
where is the stone that is the heart of
the ocean
when the old turtle heard this question
he stopped for a moment and his eyes
widened uh
i
i i can't answer that question
so you know its place tell me quickly
where is the heart of the ocean
when the old turtle persisted in not
telling where the heart of the ocean is
if you won't answer me i'll cast a spell
on you that will cause you to be unable
to sleep forever
[Music]
the old turtle was so afraid of this
magic spell that vega threatened him
with
that he had to tell the place of the
stone
[Music]
that's it
thanks old turtle take it
here's some more seaweed
[Music]
the sea witch vega and snake set off to
the heart of the ocean
[Music]
the old turtle went in search of
poseidon to tell him what happened
[Music]
at that time poseidon and arya who were
cleaning the garbage thrown into the
ocean
saw the ancient turtle
hey
the old turtle has come to help us too
oh i'm so glad i found you
old turtle you should not tire yourself
you should go and rest
there is something very important that i
have to tell you my king
what is it i am listening well
i was napping since last year and then a
weird octo lady woke me up with seaweed
the old turtle told poseidon everything
that had happened to him poseidon and
arya started swimming quickly to protect
the heart of the stone
i hope we can reach the heart of the
ocean before it's too late
the sea witch vega and snake had already
reached the heart of the ocean
vega wrapped her octopus arms around the
heart of the ocean
and began to pull
[Music]
it is heavier than i expected
[Music]
while vega was about to move the heart
of the ocean
the soul of the stone was revealed
stop
stop
now
don't touch the heart of the ocean
huh
who are you
the heart of the ocean will be mine get
out
vega didn't listen to the soul of the
heart of the ocean
and lifted the stone
with all her might
now i have all control over the oceans
just then
poseidon and little mermaid arya arrived
vega put the heart of the ocean in its
place immediately
otherwise all sea life will come to an
end
you are lying
the waters suddenly began to lose their
blueness as vega took the heart of the
ocean
and went away the fish around could not
swim
seaweeds and corals were slowly
disappearing
the heart of the ocean was also about to
lose its beautiful shine
vega you too are a sea creature like us
so you too will disappear
at that moment vega realized that she
couldn't move her octopus arms and was
terrified
they're telling the truth if i disappear
i can't conquer the deep-sea kingdom
vega finally agreed to leave the heart
of the ocean back where it belonged
the stones started to shine again
fish started to swim
seaweeds started to come to life and the
waters started to turn blue
although poseidon and the little mermaid
arya were very happy that the ocean came
back
the sea witch vega angrily returned to
her cave
because she could not get what she
wanted
the power of the heart of the ocean was
restored and life flourished once more
all creatures living underwater have
forever claimed this heart of the ocean
which allows everyone to live freely
because it is everyone's responsibility
human or fish
big or small
to protect life in the oceans
